body.transcript:
Hello, and thank you for calling Harmony Music School! My name is Raymond Green. How may I assist you today?

Hi Raymond, I'm feeling quite anxious about enrolling in the music classes. My name is Marie Morgan.

It's nice to meet you, Marie. I understand your feelings, and I'm here to help. Can I start by asking which instrument you're interested in learning?

I'm interested in learning the piano.

That's wonderful! Our piano classes are very popular. For enrollment purposes, may I have your contact number, please?

Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one two three four.

Great, thank you. And what is your email address, Marie?

It's marie.morgan@email.com.

Perfect, I have all the information I need. I'll send you the enrollment details shortly. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or concerns.

Thank you so much, Raymond. I feel a bit more at ease now.

You're very welcome, Marie. Thank you for reaching out, and I look forward to welcoming you to the Harmony Music School. Have a great day!
